2. DEPLOYMENT PIPELINE (deploy.yml) - 18KB
   ├─ Pre-Deployment Validation             [2-3 min]
   ├─ Deploy to Staging (SSH+Docker)        [10-15 min]
   ├─ Deploy to Production (Blue-Green)     [20-30 min]
   ├─ Automatic Rollback on Failure         [<5 min]
   └─ Slack Notifications                   [Real-time]
   
   ENVIRONMENTS: Staging + Production
   STRATEGY: Zero-downtime blue-green deployment
   ROLLBACK: Automatic with backup restoration

3. SECURITY PIPELINE (security.yml) - 17KB
   ├─ Secret Scanning (GitLeaks+TruffleHog) [2-3 min]
   ├─ Dependency Scanning (OWASP+Snyk)      [5-7 min]
   ├─ SAST CodeQL + SonarQube + Semgrep     [15-20 min]
   ├─ Container Scanning (Trivy+Grype+Snyk) [5-7 min]

   COVERAGE: Secrets, Dependencies, Code, Containers, Licenses, IaC

KEY WORKFLOW STEPS
================================================================================

CI WORKFLOW:
  Push → Build (JVM+Native) → Unit Tests → Integration Tests 
    → Performance Tests → Docker Build → SonarQube → Summary

DEPLOYMENT WORKFLOW:
  Trigger → Validation → Deploy (Staging/Production) → Health Checks 
    → Smoke Tests → Monitor → Success/Rollback → Notify

SECURITY WORKFLOW:
  Trigger → Secret Scan → Dependency Scan → SAST (3 tools) 
    → Container Scan → License Check → IaC Scan → Summary → Alert
